name: Displaced
description: Your mission: lead a group of civilians out of the war-torn country.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium Dual CPU E2180 2.00GHz or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 550 TI / AMD Radeon HD 6700 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00GHz or higher Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 550 TI / AMD Radeon HD 6700 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
